item.title: 5 people found dead in home in Lake Station, Indiana
item.description: It was unclear if the victims were all members of the same family, how the victims died, or if any children were involved.

item.title: Trump fires Gen. Charles Q. Brown as chair of the Joint Chiefs of Staff
item.description: President Trump said he is nominating Air Force Lt. Gen. Dan "Razin" Caine to be the next chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
